briefdescription.para: Initialize the save menu with the needed data.
Get the ID of the save file selected by the user.

simplesect.para: The ID of the selected save file, or -1 if no file was selected

briefdescription.para: Get the name of the latest save entered by the user.

simplesect.para: The name of the latest save, or NULL if no save name was entered

briefdescription.para: Show save game interface to get save name from user.

simplesect.para: MENU_SAVE_GAME if a name was entered, MENU_CONTINUE if canceled

briefdescription.para: Show load game interface to select a save file.

parameterdescription.para: indicates whether there's an active game that might need confirmation to discard

simplesect.para: MENU_LOAD_GAME if a save was selected, MENU_CONTINUE if canceled

briefdescription.para: Shuts down the save menu and frees associated data.
